explanation: [0-0] A man stands in a tea garden, wearing a multi-colored plaid shirt and carrying a backpack with orange straps. He is using a black portable tea picking machine to pick tea leaves, while holding a khaki collection bag in his right hand. The background also features green trees and tea leaves, as well as a light blue sky.
[0-6] Then, the man in the plaid shirt, holding the tea picking machine, sweeps tea leaves into the collection bag and repeats this action.
